origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialAPI.analyze_futures', 'description': 'This function analyzes the price trends of financial futures based on the asset type, time frame, and type of analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'assetType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial asset, e.g., US Treasury Bonds, Commodities.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for the analysis, e.g., 1 year, 6 months.'}, {'name': 'analysisType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of analysis to be performed, e.g., price trend, volatility.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisResult', 'description': 'The result of the financial analysis.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialAPI.analyze_futures, 它的参数输入如下: 'assetType'是'US Treasury Bonds', 'timeFrame'是'1 year', 'analysisType'是'price trend'.
